name: Festive Milestones
description: Your sims should remember their special days. This mod adds milestones for events, festivals, and holidays from various packs.

pages.title: Details
pages.html:
Summary

This mod adds milestones for all events, festivals, and holidays in City Living, Island Living, Seasons, and Snowy Escape.

Island Living

There are 8 milestones for events and festivals that occur in Sulani. To get them, you must actively participate, such as eating food at the Town Potluck or cheering on the baby turtles at the Turtle Hatching.

  • Family Fun Day
  • Flowers & Music Festival
  • Town BBQ
  • Town Potluck
  • Island Celebration
  • Beach Bonfire
  • Fishing Competition
  • Turtle Hatching

Snowy Escape

There are 4 milestones for festivals and meeting special sims in Mt. Komorebi. To get the milestones for festivals, you just need to be in the area while the festival is happening. To get the milestone for meeting Yamachan, you have to... meet Yamachan.

  • Festival of Light
  • Festival of Snow
  • Festival of Youth
  • Met Yamachan

In Development

Festive Milestones is currently in active development. These other packs are being worked on, but are not yet available.

City Living

  • Flea Market
  • GeekCon
  • Humor & Hijinks Festival
  • Romance Festival
  • Spice Festival

Seasons

  • Love Day
  • Harvestfest
  • Winterfest
  • New Year's Eve
  • Halloween*
  • Neighborhood Brawl
  • Prank Day
  • Meeting Father Winter
  • Meeting Flower Bunny

* There is no official "Halloween" holiday in Seasons. This will apply to custom holidays that use spooky decor during Autumn. If you'd like your game to include Halloween by default, use my Halloween Holiday mod.

pages.title: Changelog
pages.html:
1.0 alpha 2 (June 10, 2023)

  • Add safeguard to ensure festival is running when milestone is given
  • Change all milestones from "Life" to "Firsts"
  • Rename Island Living milestones to be more Maxis-match
  • Create Snowy Escape milestones:
    • Festival of Light
    • Festival of Snow
    • Festival of Youth
    • Met Yamachan

1.0 alpha 1 (June 7, 2023)

  • Create Island Living milestones:
    • Beach Bonfire
    • Family Fun Day
    • Fishing Competition
    • Flowers & Music Festival
    • Island Celebration
    • Town BBQ
    • Town Potluck
    • Turtle Hatching

downloadWarning: Alpha releases are incomplete snapshots of mods while they are being developed. Currently, only the Island Living and Snowy Escape features are complete. You must own Growing Together and one of Island Living or Snowy Escape to use v1.0 alpha 2.
